## 1.0.29 02/27/2019
  * Fix gem deployment on CI

## 1.0.28 02/26/2019
  * Adding changelog

  * Run Rubocop on dox-style (inception!)
  * Using standard ci: rake task like other gems
  * Packing gems
  * Adding rspec_junit_formatter
